document.full_text: a bomb blew up a u.n. jeep near the southern lebanese port city of sidon on friday, wounding six italian u.n. peacekeepers, the italian military chief of staff said, in the first attack of its kind in three years.
document.title: six u.n. peacekeepers wounded in lebanon bomb blast
lines_and_colors: a bomb blew up a u.n. jeep near the southern lebanese port city of sidon on friday, wounding six italian u.n. peacekeepers, the italian military chief of staff said, in the first attack of its kind in three years.
